A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson singlehandedly destroyed the future of Star Wars. Bad storytelling\, and a slap in the face to not only fans\, but to children who will not understand who badly they are destroying this story. This is the problem when a director doesn't take the myth seriously-essentially the modern problem with making fun of mystery and the sacred. There's no new hope for this legend\, which is unfortunate because it holds such a wonderful space in my imagination. \nI won't give any spoilers\, but i just need to say this publicly.
